name: A Year of Nightmares
description:
A Year Of Nightmares is a science-fiction horror game set in a not-so-distant future in which a mysterious entity called "The Fog" has forced a city into quarantine.

You play as a young woman named Thea, who is trying to find out what The Fog is and where it has come from, all while trying to cope with your everyday life as best as ou can.

A Year Of Nightmares is a game made as a Bachelor's Project following the Thesis that concerned itself with the depitction of mental illness in video games.

As such, the player has to determine what is real and what is not in this game, as it is shown through the eyes of a mentally ill protagonist.
